text: Ruiwen Zhang is a Chinese-American pharmaceutical scientist and is Robert L. Boblitt Endowed Professor in Drug Discovery currently at University of Houston. He is Elected Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:Fudan University alumni Category:American pharmacologists Category:Texas A&M; University faculty
title: Ruiwen Zhang
